Sheldon Whitehouse , D-R.I., and Kirsten Gillibrand , D-N.Y., said Tuesday they agreed with the need to cut spending. They said ending giveaways for oil companies would save at least$ 20 Bill Nelsonion over 10 years. This is just one example of a wasteful item in the budget that could be cut in order to make a down payment toward reducing nation's deficit. If the House chooses to adopt this suggestion, it would represent a good first step towards cutting spending in a bipartisan way, the senators wrote. US market share for 2010 rose to 9.2 percent from 8.8 percent in 2009. In Canada, the US automaker saw a market share jump of two percentage points to 13.0 percent for last year. Downing Street's indication that Andy Coulson will not be receiving severance pay is in line with the standard contract for special advisers, it said. The contract, drawn up in June, reads: Because of the power of the Crown to dismiss at will, you are not entitled to a period of notice terminating your employment. However, unless your employment is terminated by agreement, results from... disciplinary proceedings, inefficiency or grounds justifying summary dismissal at common law, you will in practice normally be given not less than three months' notice in writing terminating your employment. On the expiration of such notice, your employment will terminate. 66% of ComRes respondents thought PM should not have hired Andy Coulson knowing he had resigned as NoW editor over phone-hacking scandal.
